title: Auth0 Delegated Administration Extension
name: auth0-delegated-admin
author: auth0
description: This extension allows non-dashboard admnistrators to manage your users.

auth0.uninstallConfirmMessage: You are about to uninstall the "Authorization Extension". If you proceed all your data in this extension will be lost. Do you want to continue?
auth0.scopes: read:clients read:connections read:rules create:rules update:rules read:users update:users read:device_credentials read:logs
